thread.title: E. Cohen & Company, CPAs Promotes Kimberly H. Maxwell, CPA to Principal

author: cnbc.com
title: E. Cohen & Company, CPAs Promotes Kimberly H. Maxwell, CPA to Principal
text:
ROCKVILLE, Md., Feb. 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- E. Cohen & Company, a full-service CPA firm based in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area with over 50 employees, is pleased to announce that Kimberly H. Maxwell, CPA (Kim) has been promoted to Principal of the firm. As principal, Kim will continue to enhance the firm with her expertise specializing in audit, assurance, tax and consulting services for nonprofit and business clients. She has over 20 years of experience in serving the needs of not-for-profit and business entities.
Of the promotion of Kim Maxwell, the firm's Managing Principal, Eric Cohen said, "Kim has won the recognition of the Washington, D.C. region's top business executives in regional surveys. She is recognized for her outstanding technical insight, guidance and skill in strengthening the financial management systems of businesses and not-for-profit entities, advising on financial decisions pertaining to internal control systems and business forecasting." Cohen adds, "Kim exemplifies her role as trusted advisor, innovator and leader; and her excellent technical knowledge and practice development skills have been instrumental in driving the firm's growth and impact in our community."
Kim says she is very proud and honored to be named principal of such a dynamic firm as E. Cohen and Company, CPAs. "I look forward to continuing to work with our clients and staff to help them achieve their goals. It is extremely rewarding to provide guidance to clients on complex business issues and regulations in a constantly changing environment. ECC is an innovative firm for which I am proud to represent and continue in my career."
Kim lives in Olney, MD with her husband and three children.
About E. Cohen & Company, CPAs: E. Cohen and Company, CPAs is a full-service CPA firm of over 50 professionals based in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area providing audit & assurance, outsourced CFO, controller & accounting services, tax compliance & consulting, and business advisory services since 1991. It serves the tax, audit and business advisory needs of Government Contractors, Nonprofit Organizations, High Net Worth Individuals, Real Estate Companies, Professional Services Firms, Wholesalers, Restaurant Groups, Professional Athletes and Sports Executives. For more information, visit https://ecohencpas.com .
